hackathon-description-text: This is our 4th annual Fall Game Jam.  We start 5PM Friday 10/7 and continue until the submission deadline at 6PM Sunday.
hackathon-eligibility: Open to EKU students/alumni/friends.  If your not sure, just send us an email.
hackathon-rules: Individual and team submissions accepted.  We follow Ludum Dare jam requirements.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Wallace Building, 4366 Kit Carson Dr, Richmond, KY 40475, USA
hackathon-location-address: Wallace Building, 4366 Kit Carson Dr, Richmond, KY 40475, USA
hackathon-description-header: 48 hr game jam hosted by IGDA EKU
hackathon-location-description: Eastern Kentucky University - Wallace Building - Rm 449
